FIELD DESCRIPTION / VALUES: Code to identify whether drug is covered (C), supplemental (E) or over-the-counter (O).
Number of Prescriptions net of deleted and/or adjusted PDEs, as well as partial fill transactions.  Partial and Complete PDEs are each counted as 1.
Net Gross Drug Cost Below the Catastrophic Coverage Threshold
Net Gross Drug Cost Above the Catastrophic Coverage Threshold
Sum of Net Ingred Cost, Net Dispens Fee and Net Sales Tax
Net Low Income Cost Sharing Amount
Sum of Net Patient Pay Amount, Net Other Troop Amount and Net LICS Amount
Net Patient Liability Reduction Due to Other (non-TrOOP) Payers
